- There are resources (indicated by `$`, `@`, `&`, and `%`) within range on the left and below.
- I see enemy tanks represented by `&` at (11, 0).

I will move down (ACTION_DOWN) to (7, 5) in order to explore further and potentially gather resources as I will still be able to confront any threats if necessary.

``` Action: 4 ```
This action should allow me to reposition effectively in search of resources while keeping me aware of the enemy's presence.
